channel.title: Pi Donator Tab Edit
channel.description:
Hey guys I was wandering if anyone is willing to explain to me how to edit my Donator tab on a PI, I'm not so good with Clients, That's why I'm here(:
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2lsdzrp.jpg[/img]
So what I'm trying to do is remove the get 25 kill count *When in Godwars and add in Spec restore. Thanks to anyone that trys to help because I was digging around alot couldn't find a thread about this.

item.title: Pi Donator Tab Edit
item.dc:creator: @bandosss bandosss
item.description:
@bandosss wrote:

Skyro:

Go into your client and go to RSInterface.java. Then search for it and change it to what you want. Then you need to go to actionHandler and clicking buttons to make it restore the special.

Thanks but what I mean by I need help if it’s possible explain What do I search for in RSInterface.java and the same with action handlers and clicking buttons.

Read full topic

item.title: Pi Donator Tab Edit
item.dc:creator: @Skyro Arbe
item.description:
@Skyro wrote:

Go into your client and go to RSInterface.java. Then search for it and change it to what you want. Then you need to go to actionHandler and clicking buttons to make it restore the special.

Read full topic
